title: Retrieve Dialogue Unit by ID Method Arguments
name: retrieve_dialogue_unit_by_id
description: Arguments to query a database of conversation prompt-response entries using a specific dialogue unit entry ID. Entries are topical prompt-response pairs assigned to discussion sessions. Synonyms for dialogue unit are for instance prompt-response pair, conversation piece, chat fragment, discussion element, and interaction record.

dialogue_unit_id.description: The unique identifier of the dialogue unit to be retrieved.
